testcase.classname: Read/Get customer's data from RESTful service
testcase.name: Read an existing customer's data
testcase.system-out: Given URL is "http://localhost:8080/CustomerData/rest/xml/".................passed Given database has a customer's data with name "Udit", address "Random Street" and phone "229911122".passed When the client sends the GET request with name "Udit"......................passed Then the client should obtain the following XML message.....................passed

testcase.classname: Read/Get customer's data from RESTful service
testcase.name: Read an existing customer's data
testcase.system-out: Given URL is "http://localhost:8080/CustomerData/rest/xml/".................passed Given database has a customer's data with name "David", address "2 random st." and phone "226611000".passed And database has another customer's data with name "Peter", address "Queen St." and phone "220001166".passed And database has another customer's data with name "Gary", address "Hobsan St." and phone "661062217".passed When the client sends the GET request.......................................passed Then the client should obtain the following XML message.....................passed

testcase.classname: Read/Get customer's data from RESTful service
testcase.name: Try to get data of non existing customer
testcase.system-out: Given URL is "http://localhost:8080/CustomerData/rest/xml/".................passed Given there is no customer's data with name "RandomCustomer"................passed When the client sends the GET request with name "RandomCustomer"............passed Then the client should obtain the following XML message.....................passed
